languages.text: {n}Соломон долго молчит перед ответом.{/n} "Я признаю поражение. Признаю, что вы — Вольный Торговец, неподвластны моему суду. И я с благодарностью принимаю помилование и клянусь служить вам".
{n}For a time, Solomorne says nothing.{/n} "I admit defeat. I admit that you are a Rogue Trader, one who is beyond my judgement. I gratefully accept my pardon and swear an oath of service to you."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон долго молчит перед ответом.{/n} "Я признаю поражение. Признаю, что вы — Вольный Торговец, неподвластны моему суду. И я с благодарностью принимаю помилование и клянусь служить вам".

languages.text: {n}Solomorne schweigt eine Weile.{/n} "Ich gestehe meine Niederlage ein. Ihr seid {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und entzieht Euch meinem Urteil. Ich nehme meine Begnadigung dankend an und schwöre Euch hiermit die Treue."
languages.original_text: {n}For a time, Solomorne says nothing.{/n} "I admit defeat. I admit that you are a Rogue Trader, one who is beyond my judgement. I gratefully accept my pardon and swear an oath of service to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne schweigt eine Weile.{/n} "Ich gestehe meine Niederlage ein. Ihr seid {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und entzieht Euch meinem Urteil. Ich nehme meine Begnadigung dankend an und schwöre Euch hiermit die Treue."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne reste silencieux quelques instants, avant de déclarer :{/n} « Je m'avoue vaincu. J'admets que vous êtes {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, un statut qui vous place hors de la portée de mon jugement. J'accepte avec gratitude mon pardon et jure de vous servir. »
languages.original_text: {n}For a time, Solomorne says nothing.{/n} "I admit defeat. I admit that you are a Rogue Trader, one who is beyond my judgement. I gratefully accept my pardon and swear an oath of service to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne reste silencieux quelques instants, avant de déclarer :{/n} « Je m'avoue vaincu. J'admets que vous êtes {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, un statut qui vous place hors de la portée de mon jugement. J'accepte avec gratitude mon pardon et jure de vous servir. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙沉默了许久。{/n}“我认输了。我承认，你是货真价实的行商浪人，我完全无权评判你的所作所为。我感激地接受你的宽恕，在此宣誓对你效忠。”
languages.original_text: {n}For a time, Solomorne says nothing.{/n} "I admit defeat. I admit that you are a Rogue Trader, one who is beyond my judgement. I gratefully accept my pardon and swear an oath of service to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙沉默了许久。{/n}“我认输了。我承认，你是货真价实的行商浪人，我完全无权评判你的所作所为。我感激地接受你的宽恕，在此宣誓对你效忠。”

languages.text: {n}Durante un tiempo, Solomorne guarda silencio.{/n} «Admito la derrota. Admito que es Comerciante Independiente, y que está más allá de mi poder el juzgarle. Acepto agradecido el perdón y juro servirle».
languages.original_text: {n}For a time, Solomorne says nothing.{/n} "I admit defeat. I admit that you are a Rogue Trader, one who is beyond my judgement. I gratefully accept my pardon and swear an oath of service to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Durante un tiempo, Solomorne guarda silencio.{/n} «Admito la derrota. Admito que es Comerciante Independiente, y que está más allá de mi poder el juzgarle. Acepto agradecido el perdón y juro servirle».

languages.text: {n}しばらくの間、ソロモーンは何も言わなかった。{/n}「負けを認めます。あなたが私の判断を超えたローグトレーダーであることを認めます。恩赦に感謝し、あなたに仕えることを誓います」
languages.original_text: {n}For a time, Solomorne says nothing.{/n} "I admit defeat. I admit that you are a Rogue Trader, one who is beyond my judgement. I gratefully accept my pardon and swear an oath of service to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}しばらくの間、ソロモーンは何も言わなかった。{/n}「負けを認めます。あなたが私の判断を超えたローグトレーダーであることを認めます。恩赦に感謝し、あなたに仕えることを誓います」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne bir süre sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Yenilgimi kabulleniyorum. Hür Tacir olduğunuzu, benim hükmümün ötesinde bir mertebeye sahip olduğunuzu kabul ediyorum. Affınızı minnetle karşılıyor ve size olan hizmetimde kusur etmeyeceğime yemin ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}For a time, Solomorne says nothing.{/n} "I admit defeat. I admit that you are a Rogue Trader, one who is beyond my judgement. I gratefully accept my pardon and swear an oath of service to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne bir süre sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Yenilgimi kabulleniyorum. Bir Hür Tacir olduğunuzu, benim hükmümün ötesinde bir mertebeye sahip olduğunuzu kabul ediyorum. Affınızı minnetle karşılıyor ve size karşı hizmetimde kusur etmeyeceğime yemin ediyorum."
